subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Playing in the final twosome Saturday with Phil Mickelson, Nick Watney carded a five-under 67 to share the lead with Mickelson after three rounds at the WGC-CA Championship.
snippet: Playing in the final twosome Saturday with Phil Mickelson, Nick Watney carded a five-under 67 to share the lead with Mickelson after three rounds at the WGC-CA Championship.
